channel.title: RuneWings Infinity [Next generation Devolution]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2dgq96r.png[/img][/center] Basic Information: This is a 317 Devolution server with Galkons latest renamed client. We have successfuly linked the 2 together. We are getting creative with this server (which is why we chose Devolution over others), yet make it fun! Client: We have successfully linked Galkons Renamed to our Devolution source. Before I put this online for people to play, I want to have Full Screen complete, a few custom maps, some items, new interfaces and other things for emotes. I'm planning on eventually packaging sounds and putting them and then linking the sounds to things such as bosses, magic casts, players being hit, dieing, players hitting others, range, and other simple things like those. I don't know if I'm going to go into an all out music system or not yet, but I do want to add the theme song at the log in page and maybe 3-5 tracks in game (excluding bosses and minigames). We'll be adding the UIDs soon. Server: So, I haven't been doing much with the server (thus, me not being able to see what I'm doing cause I don't have the client yet, he's still working on it). I plan on adding pet cats and maybe sooner or later code a custom mini-game. I have done some stuff to the server, like added some new configs (not done with them yet) and I plan on recoding some skills. Some of them I will let go, but will add to. Web Site: Our custom coded website is just about done. I'm planning on putting in a CSS before we're completely done so I don't have to edit every file every time I want to update. Other than that, we have hover images, an image gallery, and when we get the site, I'll put up the forums. In the feature I would like to add in an auto donation system, highscores and a site log in. The reason I do NOT want Vote4Cash is because people will abuse (no questions about it) and I don't want to deal with it. I would also like to add a thing that shows how many players are online.
[5.18.11]Did some editing to the website. [5.19.11]Got new Devolution 2.7 Server [5.19.11]Got Galkons Refactored Client [5.19.11]Redid the Configs file [5.19.11]Worked on the new gameframe [5.19.11]Made new buttons for the site [5.20.11]Added new configs to server [5.20.11]Added hover images to the buttons on the site [5.20.11]Added new RuneScape cursors [5.21.11]Set up CSS for site [5.22.11]Website complete [5.22.11]Removed all NPCs and Shops from server
Pictures: Here is the site beta. Its only the homepage but we do have more pages :P This is not the completed site!!! [img]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/6151/sitel.png[/img] Staff: Server Coder/Site Coder = XLdarkwingLX (Me) Server Coder/Sponsor= Wolfy (runewings wolfy) Client Coder/GFX Designer = Xion I would like to thank: Kono-chan - for giving me a tutorial for Hover Images Loveandpower - for his all out support on everything I do Martino - his all out support and excitement to get online And all others who have supported us and my development team.

item.title: RuneWings Infinity [Next generation Devolution]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Kono-chan, post:49, topic:395302”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=492487.msg3604409#msg3604409 date=1305948083]

You would wanna try to copy me and make fullscreen LOL!

getScreenWidth()
getScreenHeight()

WOW that was hard!

Not like tons of other people have mad fullscreen clients before, including me.

You’re way off.

It was just an example, actually. Fullscreen is really easy. Just get the screen size, set the game-screen to that size, move the gameframe pieces, etc. I know there’s more to it then that obviously, seeing as I’ve done it a few times.

resize() is what I generally use tbh.

Ah ok, didn’t want anyone thinking it’s that easy.
[/quote]

It’s not THAT easy, but it’s still pretty easy. Changing the size when the client is running / you’re logged in is fairly annoying though. :p[/quote]

You have to understand the client pretty well though, you can just go in knowing nothing about the rs2 client. I was assuming when kids saw that post where you said it was easy they would go try and do it and fuck it all up.

Read full topic

item.description:

You would wanna try to copy me and make fullscreen LOL!

getScreenWidth()
getScreenHeight()

WOW that was hard!

Not like tons of other people have mad fullscreen clients before, including me.

You’re way off.

It was just an example, actually. Fullscreen is really easy. Just get the screen size, set the game-screen to that size, move the gameframe pieces, etc. I know there’s more to it then that obviously, seeing as I’ve done it a few times.

resize() is what I generally use tbh.
[/quote]
Ah ok, didn’t want anyone thinking it’s that easy.[/quote]

It’s not THAT easy, but it’s still pretty easy. Changing the size when the client is running / you’re logged in is fairly annoying though.

Read full topic
